task: Develop a basic 'Runescape' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Put in earplugs'.
name: Silent Realms

branding_data.short_description: Silent Realms is an MMORPG inspired by Runescape, where players explore a vast world with limited auditory cues.
branding_data.detailed_description: Silent Realms is a unique MMORPG that draws inspiration from the classic game Runescape, offering a familiar yet fresh experience. In this world, players must navigate, explore, and complete quests with minimal auditory feedback, as if they are adventuring with earplugs. This twist challenges players to rely more on visual cues and written dialogue, creating an immersive and introspective experience. The game features a rich fantasy setting, skill-based progression, and a diverse array of activities including crafting, combat, and trading. The absence of traditional sound effects and music encourages players to engage with the environment and community in innovative ways.

errors: Expecting property name enclosed in double quotes: line 1 column 2 (char 1)
